mapper.select:
select TEMP.MEM_UID , TEMP.MEM_NAME , TEMP.MEM_PHONE , TEMP.MEM_REG_NUM , TEMP.MEM_CHK , TEMP.MEM_RDO , TEMP.MEM_DESC , TEMP.CREATE_DT , MEM.MEM_UID AS APRV_MEM_UID from TB_COMM_MEMBER_TEMP TEMP LEFT JOIN KCS.TB_COMM_MEMBER MEM on TEMP.MEM_UID = MEM.MEM_UID
AND TEMP.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{memName} || '%'
AND TEMP.MEM_PHONE LIKE '%' || #{memPhone} || '%' Q
AND TEMP.MEM_REG_NUM LIKE '%' || #{memRegNum} || '%'
ORDER BY TEMP.CREATE_DT DESC

select MEM_UID , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_REG_NUM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(MEM_PHONE, '[^-]+', 1, 1) AS mem_phone1 , REGEXP_SUBSTR(MEM_PHONE, '[^-]+', 1, 2) AS mem_phone2 , REGEXP_SUBSTR(MEM_PHONE, '[^-]+', 1, 3) AS mem_phone3 , REGEXP_SUBSTR(MEM_REG_NUM, '[^-]+', 1, 1) AS mem_reg_num1 , REGEXP_SUBSTR(MEM_REG_NUM, '[^-]+', 1, 2) AS mem_reg_num2 , MEM_CHK , MEM_RDO , MEM_DESC from TB_COMM_MEMBER_TEMP TEMP WHERE MEM_UID = #{memUid}
